questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: Well, my best memory of a holiday, It was this summer. I went to Montenegro with my mother and my brother. I tested for the first time; paragliding. It's similar that parachute jump but you are not jump by a plane, you must go at the top of a mountain, you run and you jump on the air. After that, you just look the landscape and relax. This view was amazing. The blue sea, the moutain, the beach, everything was beautiful. This memory is the best experience that i've done!
